word_mean: 土拨鼠：为松鼠科几种大的陆栖动物，属于旱獭属(Marmota)和土拨鼠属(Arcto-mys)，见于北半球，如北美的灰土拨鼠与黄肚皮土拨鼠和亚洲的土拨鼠
他们可能是鼠疫的自然贮主

sentence.Network_en: Such a cute marmot , no wander I like It'so much, hehe!
sentence.Network_cn: 如此可爱的土拨鼠, 难怪我会那么喜欢它, 呵呵!

sentence.Network_en: In Heiligenblut, almost all the souvenir shops are selling the marmot toys.
sentence.Network_cn: 在海立根布鲁特, 几乎每家纪念品商店都出售土拨鼠玩具.

sentence.Network_en: To survive as a lone marmot, you have to be tough.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只独立的土拨鼠要想能生存下去, 它必须要能经受住风风雨雨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French marmotte, probably via Romansch murmont from late Latin mus montanus 'mountain mouse'; compare with French marmotter 'mutter through the teeth'

means.word_mean: 1. stocky coarse-furred burrowing rodent with a short bushy tail found throughout the northern hemisphere; hibernates in winter

auth_sentence.content: Marmota himalayana is closely related to the woodchuck, the hoary marmot and the yellow-bellied marmot.
